sys_script.name: Update Calculation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_bd8975ac1b9ce010af1ef436464bcbab
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_isgi_roster_plan</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Calculation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/){

getFixedSeats();	
getSharedSeats();
	
function getFixedSeats(){
var gr = new GlideRecord('x_isgi_roster_plan');
gr.addQuery('slc',current.slc);
gr.addQuery('month',current.month_value);
gr.addQuery('type','1');
gr.addQuery('workflow_state','3');
gr.query();
var Fixed = gr.getRowCount();
gs.addInfoMessage(Fixed);
}	
	
function getSharedSeats(){
var gr = new GlideRecord('x_isgi_roster_plan');
gr.addQuery('slc',current.slc);
gr.addQuery('month',current.month_value);
gr.addQuery('type','2');
gr.addQuery('workflow_state','3');	
gr.query();
var Shared = gr.getRowCount();
gs.addInfoMessage(Shared);
}		




})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mohamed.rafiulla@isg-one.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-02 11:44:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd8975ac1b9ce010af1ef436464bcbab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Calculation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="roster" source="x_isgi_roster">3f44a5b11b739c149d4e6392f54bcbbf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="roster">3f44a5b11b739c149d4e6392f54bcbbf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bd8975ac1b9ce010af1ef436464bcbab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mohamed.rafiulla@isg-one.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 11:45:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bd8975ac1b9ce010af1ef436464bcbab"/></record_update>
